name: Park Avenue Series 44 Churchill Maduro
additionalNotes:
I can not find a listing for these but I do have them.  I've had them for over a year.  I would like to be able to put them in my virtual humidor and review them.  I can send you a picture of one of mine if you want.

I think this guy is reviewing one although he doesn't identify it as such.  The wrapper appears to be the Maduro not the Colorado Claro the regular Park Avenues are.  http://www.puff.com/forums/vb/non-habanos-reviews/307607-gurkha-park-avenue-churchill-noob-review.html
